amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for predator control efforts under the Animal Damage Control Program by $13.4 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 as printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Animal Damage Control Program by $13.4 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 279 (Roll no. 230).
